  245: 
  246: all() ->
  247:     [
  248:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  249:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  250:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  251:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  252:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  253:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  254:     ] ++ simple_api_tests().
  255: 
  256: groups() ->
  257:     [
  258:      {'tlsv1.3', [], ((gen_api_tests() ++ tls13_group() ++
  259:                            handshake_paus_tests()) --
  260:                           [dh_params,
  261:                            new_options_in_handshake,
  262:                            handshake_continue_tls13_client])
  263:       ++ (since_1_2() -- [conf_signature_algs])},
  264:      {'tlsv1.2', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ since_1_2() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ [honor_client_cipher_order_tls12,
  265:                                                                                                 honor_server_cipher_order_tls12]},
  266:      {'tlsv1.1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()},
  267:      {'tlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2() ++ beast_mitigation_test()},
  268:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  269:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()},
  270:      {'dtlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  271:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()}
  272:     ].
  273: 
  274: since_1_2() ->
  275:     [
  276:      conf_signature_algs,
  277:      no_common_signature_algs,
  278:      versions_option_based_on_sni,
  279:      ciphers_option_based_on_sni,
  280:      root_any_sign
  281:     ].
  282: 
  283: pre_1_3() ->
  284:     [
  285:      default_reject_anonymous,
  286:      connection_information_with_srp
  287:     ].
  288: 
  289: pre_1_2() ->
  290:     [honor_server_cipher_order,
  291:      honor_client_cipher_order].
  292: 
  293: simple_api_tests() ->
  294:     [
  295:      invalid_keyfile,
  296:      invalid_certfile,
  297:      invalid_cacertfile,
  298:      invalid_dhfile,
  299:      options_not_proplist,
  300:      options_whitebox,
  301:      format_error
  302:     ].
  303: 
  304: gen_api_tests() ->
  305:     [
  306:      peercert,
  307:      peercert_with_client_cert,
  308:      select_best_cert,
  309:      select_sha1_cert,
  310:      connection_information,
  311:      secret_connection_info,
  312:      keylog_connection_info,
  313:      versions,
  314:      new_options_in_handshake,
  315:      active_n,
  316:      dh_params,
  317:      hibernate_client,
  318:      hibernate_server,
  319:      listen_socket,
  320:      peername,
  321:      recv_active,
  322:      recv_active_once,
  323:      recv_active_n,
  324:      recv_no_active_msg,
  325:      recv_timeout,
  326:      recv_close,
  327:      controlling_process,
  328:      controller_dies,
  329:      controlling_process_transport_accept_socket,
  330:      close_with_timeout,
  331:      close_in_error_state,
  332:      call_in_error_state,
  333:      close_transport_accept,
  334:      ipv6,
  335:      der_input,
  336:      max_handshake_size,

  342:      cipher_listing,
  343:      export_key_materials,
  344:      legacy_prf
  345:     ].
  346: 
  347: handshake_paus_tests() ->
  348:     [
  349:      handshake_continue, 
  350:      handshake_continue_timeout,
  351:      handshake_continue_change_verify,
  352:      hello_client_cancel,
  353:      hello_server_cancel,
  354:      handshake_continue_tls13_client
  355:     ].
  356: 
  357: %% Only relevant for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0
  358: beast_mitigation_test() ->
  359:     [%% Original option
  360:      rizzo_disabled,
  361:      %% Same effect as disable
  362:      rizzo_zero_n, 
  363:      %% Same as default
  364:      rizzo_one_n_minus_one 
  365:     ].
  366: 
  367: tls13_group() ->
  368:     [
  369:      supported_groups,
  370:      honor_server_cipher_order_tls13,
  371:      honor_client_cipher_order_tls13,
  372:      client_options_negative_version_gap,
  373:      client_options_negative_dependency_version,
  374:      client_options_negative_dependency_stateless,
  375:      client_options_negative_dependency_role,
  376:      client_options_negative_early_data,
  377:      server_options_negative_early_data,
  378:      server_options_negative_version_gap,
  379:      server_options_negative_dependency_role,
  380:      server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed,
  381:      invalid_options_tls13,
  382:      cookie,
  383:      exporter_master_secret_consumed
  384:     ].
  385: 
  386: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  387:     catch crypto:stop(),
  388:     try crypto:start() of
  389: 	ok ->
  390: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  391: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  392:     catch _:_ ->
  393: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  394:     end.
  395: 
  396: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  397:     ssl:stop(),
  398:     application:unload(ssl),
  399:     application:stop(crypto).
  400: 
  401: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  402:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  403:         true  ->
  404:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, 
  405:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  406:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  407:                                          {version, GroupName}
  408:                                         | Config]);
  409:         false -> 
  410:             Config
  411:     end.
  412: 
  413: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  414:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  415: 
  416: init_per_testcase(handshake_continue_tls13_client, Config) ->
  417:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  418:         true ->
  419:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  420:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  421:             Config;
  422:         false ->
  423:             {skip, "Missing crypto support: TLS 1.3 not supported"}
  424:     end;
  425: init_per_testcase(connection_information_with_srp, Config) ->
  426:     PKAlg = proplists:get_value(public_keys, crypto:supports()),
  427:     case lists:member(srp, PKAlg) of
  428:         true ->
  429:             Config;
  430:         false ->
  431:             {skip, "Missing SRP crypto support"}
  432:     end;
  433: init_per_testcase(conf_signature_algs, Config) ->
  434:     case ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()) of
  435:         sha256 ->
  436:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  437:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  438:             Config;
  439:         sha ->
  440:             {skip, "Tests needs certs with sha256"}
  441:     end;
  442: init_per_testcase(check_random_nonce, Config) ->
  443:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  444:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  445:     Config;
  446: init_per_testcase(select_best_cert, Config) ->
  447:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  448:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  449:     %% We need to make sure TLS-1.3 can be supported as
  450:     %% want to generate a TLS-1.3 specific certificate that will not
  451:     %% be chosen
  452:     case Version of
  453:         'tlsv1.2' ->
  454:               case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  455:                   true ->
  456:                       Config;
  457:                   false ->
  458:                       {skip, "Crypto does not support EDDSA"}
  459:               end;
  460:         _ ->
  461:             Config
  462:     end;
  463: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  464:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  465:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  466:     Config.
  467: 
  468: end_per_testcase(internal_active_n, _Config) ->
  469:     application:unset_env(ssl, internal_active_n);
  470: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  471:     Config.
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  475: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  476: peercert() ->
  477:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  478: peercert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  479:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  480:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  481:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  482: 
  483:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  484: 					{from, self()},
  485: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  486: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  487:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  488:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  489: 					{host, Hostname},
  490: 			   {from, self()},
  491: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  492: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  493: 
  494:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  495:     [{'Certificate', BinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  496: 
  497:     ServerMsg = {error, no_peercert},
  498:     ClientMsg = {ok, BinCert},
  499: 
  500:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  501: 
  502:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  503: 
  504:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  505:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  506: 
  507: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  508: 
  509: peercert_with_client_cert() ->
  510:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  511: peercert_with_client_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  512:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  513:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  514:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  515: 
  516:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  517: 					{from, self()},
  518: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  519: 			   {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  520:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  521:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  522: 					{host, Hostname},
  523: 			   {from, self()},
  524: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  525: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  526: 
  527:     ServerCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  528:     [{'Certificate', ServerBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ServerCertFile),
  529:      ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  530:     [{'Certificate', ClientBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  531: 
  532:     ServerMsg = {ok, ClientBinCert},
  533:     ClientMsg = {ok, ServerBinCert},
  534: 
  535:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  536: 
  537:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  538: 
  539:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  540:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  541: 
  542: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  543: select_best_cert() ->
  544:     [{doc,"Basic test of the certs_keys option."}].
  545: 
  546: select_best_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  547:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  548:     Conf = test_config(Version, Config),
  549:     lists:foreach(
  550:       fun({#{server_config := SConfig,
  551:              client_config := CConfig},
  552:            {client_peer, CExpected},
  553:            {server_peer, SExpected}}) ->
  554:               selected_peer(CExpected, SExpected,
  555:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(CConfig, Config),
  556:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SConfig, Config),
  557:                             Conf)
  558:       end, Conf).
  559: 
  560: 
  561: 
  562: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  563: select_sha1_cert() ->
  564:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with rsa and sha1"}].
  565: 
  566: select_sha1_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  567:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  568:     TestConfRSA =
  569:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  570:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  571:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  572:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  573:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  574:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  575:                                          },
  576:                                     client_chain =>
  577:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  578:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  579:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  580:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  581:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  582:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  583: 
  584:     TestConfECDSA =
  585:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  586:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  587:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  588:                                           intermediates =>
  589:                                               [[{digest, sha},
  590:                                                 {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  591:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha},
  592:                                                     {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]
  593:                                          },
  594:                                     client_chain =>
  595:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  596:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  597:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  598:                                                              {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  599:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  600:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]}}),
  601:     test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, TestConfRSA, TestConfECDSA, Config).
  602: 
  603: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  604: root_any_sign() ->
  605:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with unsupported signature for the root will succeed, "
  606:       "as it is not verified"}].
  607: 
  608: root_any_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  609:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  610:     #{client_config := CSucess, server_config := SSucess} =
  611:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  612:                                          #{root => [{digest, sha},
  613:                                                     {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  614:                                            intermediates => [[{digest, sha256},
  615:                                                               {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  616:                                            peer =>  [{digest, sha256}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  617:                                           },
  618:                                      client_chain =>
  619:                                          #{root => [{digest, sha},
  620:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  621:                                            intermediates => [[{digest, sha256},
  622:                                                               {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  623:                                            peer => [{digest, sha256},
  624:                                                     {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  625: 
  626:     #{client_config := CFail, server_config := SFail} =
  627:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  628:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha256},
  629:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  630:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  631:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  632:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha256}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  633:                                          },
  634:                                     client_chain =>
  635:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha256},
  636:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  637:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  638:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  639:                                           peer => [{digest, sha256},
  640:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  641: 
  642:     %% Makes sha1 disallowed for certificate signatures when set explicitly 
  643:     %% (default for signature_algs_cert was changed to allow them if signatures_algs is not set explicitly)
  644:     SigAlgs = ssl:signature_algs(default, Version), 
  645:     %% Root signatures are not validated, so its signature will not fail the connection                             
  646:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(CSucess, [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, SigAlgs} | SSucess], Config),
  647:     %% Intermediate cert signatures are validated, so sha1 signatures will fail connection                             
  648:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(CFail, [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, SigAlgs} | SFail],
  649:                              Config, unsupported_certificate).
  650: 
  651: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  652: connection_information() ->
  653:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/1"}].
  654: connection_information(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  655:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  656:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  657:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  658:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  659: 					{from, self()},
  660: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  661: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  662: 
  663:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  664:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  665: 					{host, Hostname},
  666: 			   {from, self()},
  667: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  668: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  669: 
  670:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  671: 
  672:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  673: 
  674:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  675:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  676: 
  677: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  678: connection_information_with_srp() ->
  679:     [{doc,"Test the result of API function ssl:connection_information/1"
  680:           "includes srp_username."}].
  681: connection_information_with_srp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  682:     run_conn_info_srp_test(srp_anon, 'aes_128_cbc', Config).
  683: 
  684: run_conn_info_srp_test(Kex, Cipher, Config) ->
  685:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  686:     TestCiphers = ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(Kex, Cipher, Version),
  687: 
  688:     case TestCiphers of
  689:         [] ->
  690:             {skip, {not_sup, Kex, Cipher, Version}};
  691:         [TestCipher | _T] ->
  692:             do_run_conn_info_srp_test(TestCipher, Version, Config)
  693:     end.
  694: 
  695: do_run_conn_info_srp_test(ErlangCipherSuite, Version, Config) ->
  696:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  697: 
  698:     SOpts = [{user_lookup_fun, {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, undefined}}],
  699:     COpts = [{verify, verify_none}, {srp_identity, {"Test-User", "secret"}}],
  700: 
  701:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts, Config),
  702:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts, Config),
  703: 
  704:     ?CT_LOG("Erlang Cipher Suite is: ~p~n", [ErlangCipherSuite]),
  705: 
  706:     Server =
  707:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  708:                                    {from, self()},
  709:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, server]}},
  710:                                    {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  711:                                               ServerOpts]}]),
  712:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  713:     Client =
  714:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  715:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  716:            {host, Hostname},
  717:            {from, self()},
  718:            {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, client]}},
  719:            {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  720:                       ClientOpts]}]),
  721: 
  722:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  723: 
  724:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  725:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  726: 
  727: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  728: 
  729: secret_connection_info() ->
  730:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  731: secret_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  732:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  733:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  734:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  735: 
  736:     Server =
  737:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  738:                                    {from, self()},
  739:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  740:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  741:     
  742:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  743:     Client =
  744:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  745:                                    {host, Hostname},
  746:                                    {from, self()},
  747:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  748:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
  749:     
  750:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  751: 			   
  752:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, true, Client, true),
  753:     
  754:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  755:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  756: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  757: keylog_connection_info() ->
  758:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  759: keylog_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  760:     keylog_connection_info(Config, true),
  761:     keylog_connection_info(Config, false).
  762: keylog_connection_info(Config, KeepSecrets) ->
  763:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  764:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  765:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  766: 
  767:     Server =
  768:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  769:                                    {from, self()},
  770:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  771:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} | ServerOpts]}]),
  772: 
  773:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  774:     Client =
  775:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  776:                                    {host, Hostname},
  777:                                    {from, self()},
  778:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  779:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} |ClientOpts]}]),
  780: 
  781:     ?CT_LOG("KeepSecrets ~p Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [KeepSecrets, Client, Server]),
  782: 
  783:     ServerKeylog = receive
  784:                        {Server, {ok, Keylog}} ->
  785:                            Keylog;
  786:                        {Server, ServerError} ->
  787:                            ct:fail({server, ServerError})
  788:                    after 5000 ->
  789:                            ct:fail({server, timeout})
  790:                    end,
  791: 
  792:     receive
  793:         {Client, {ok, ServerKeylog}} ->
  794:             ok;
  795:         {Client, {ok, ClientKeylog}} ->
  796:             ct:fail({mismatch, {ServerKeylog, ClientKeylog}});
  797:         {Client, ClientError} ->
  798:             ct:fail({client, ClientError})
  799:     after 5000 ->
  800:             ct:fail({client, timeout})
  801:     end,
  802: 
  803:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  804:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  805: 
  806: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  807: dh_params() ->
  808:     [{doc,"Test to specify DH-params file in server."}].
  809: 
  810: dh_params(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  811:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  812:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  813:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  814:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
  815:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.2'),
  816:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  817:                                                           (srp_anon) -> false;
  818:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
  819:                                                           (_) -> true end}]),
  820: 
  821:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  822:     
  823:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  824: 					{from, self()}, 
  825: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  826: 			   {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts]}]),
  827:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  828:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  829: 					{host, Hostname},
  830: 			   {from, self()}, 
  831: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  832: 			   {options,
  833: 			    [{ciphers,[{dhe_rsa,aes_256_cbc,sha}]} | 
  834: 				       ClientOpts]}]),
  835:     
  836:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  837:     
  838:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  839:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  840: 
  841: 
  842: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  843: invalid_dhfile() ->
  844:     [{doc,"Test to check invalid DH-params file in server."}].
  845: invalid_dhfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  846:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  847:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  848:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  849:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam-invalid.pem"),
  850: 
  851:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  852: 
  853:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  854:                                               {from, self()},
  855:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  856:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  857:                                                      []}},
  858:                                                {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}
  859:                                                           | ServerOpts]}]),
  860:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  861:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  862:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  863:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  864:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  865:                                                      []}},
  866:                                               {options, [{ciphers,
  867:                                                           [{dhe_rsa,
  868:                                                             aes_256_cbc, sha}]}
  869:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  870: 
  871:     %% assert server error
  872:     [{Server, {error, {options, {dhfile, DHParamFile,
  873:                                  {error, {asn1,
  874:                                           {{invalid_value, 0}, _Stack}}}}}}}] =
  875:         ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server]),
  876: 
  877:     %% assert client error
  878:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, {error, closed}),
  879: 
  880:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  881:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  882: 
  883: 
  884: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  885: conf_signature_algs() ->
  886:     [{doc,"Test to set the signature_algs option on both client and server"}].
  887: conf_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  888:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  889:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  890:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  891:     Server = 
  892: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  893: 				   {from, self()}, 
  894: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  895: 				   {options,  [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}, 
  896:                                                {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  897:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  898:     Client = 
  899: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  900: 				   {host, Hostname},
  901: 				   {from, self()}, 
  902: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  903: 				   {options, [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]},
  904:                                               {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts]}]),
  905:     
  906:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  907:     
  908:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  909:     
  910:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  911:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  912:

  914: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  915: no_common_signature_algs()  ->
  916:     [{doc,"Set the signature_algs option so that there client and server does not share any hash sign algorithms"}].
  917: no_common_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  918:     
  919:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  920:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  921: 
  922:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  923: 
  924: 
  925:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  926: 					      {from, self()},
  927: 					      {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}
  928: 							 | ServerOpts]}]),
  929:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  930:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  931:                                               {host, Hostname},
  932:                                               {from, self()},
  933:                                               {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha384, rsa}]}
  934:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  935:     
  936:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
  937: 
  938: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  939: handshake_continue() ->
  940:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3"}].
  941: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  942:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  943:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  944:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  945: 
  946:     Server =
  947:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  948:                                    {host, Hostname},
  949:                                    {from, self()},
  950:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  951:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  952:                                                                             {verify, verify_peer},
  953:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  954:                                                                       ],
  955:                                                                       Config)},
  956:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  957:                                   ]),
  958:     
  959:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  960: 
  961:     Client =
  962:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  963:                                    {host, Hostname},
  964:                                    {from, self()},
  965:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  966:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  967:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts
  968:                                                                       ],
  969:                                                                       Config)},
  970:                                    {continue_options,  [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  971:      
  972:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  973:     
  974:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  975:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  976: 
  977: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  978: handshake_continue_tls13_client() ->
  979:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with fixed TLS 1.3 client"}].
  980: handshake_continue_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  981:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  982:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  983:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  984:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  985:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  986:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  987:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  988:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  989:     Server =
  990:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  991:                                    {from, self()},
  992:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  993:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  994:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer},
  995:                                                                        {ciphers, SCiphers},
  996:                                                                       {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  997:                                                                       ],
  998:                                                                      Config)},
  999:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
 1000:                                   ]),
 1001: 
 1002:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1003: 
 1004:     DummyTicket =
 1005:         <<131,116,0,0,0,5,100,0,4,104,107,100,102,100,0,6,115,104,97,51,
 1006:           56,52,100,0,3,112,115,107,109,0,0,0,48,150,90,38,127,26,12,5,
 1007:           228,180,235,229,214,215,27,236,149,182,82,14,140,50,81,0,150,
 1008:           248,152,180,193,207,80,52,107,196,200,2,77,4,96,140,65,239,205,
 1009:           224,125,129,179,147,103,100,0,3,115,110,105,107,0,25,112,114,
 1010:           111,117,100,102,111,111,116,46,111,116,112,46,101,114,105,99,
 1011:           115,115,111,110,46,115,101,100,0,6,116,105,99,107,101,116,104,6,
 1012:           100,0,18,110,101,119,95,115,101,115,115,105,111,110,95,116,105,
 1013:           99,107,101,116,98,0,0,28,32,98,127,110,83,249,109,0,0,0,8,0,0,0,
 1014:           0,0,0,0,5,109,0,0,0,113,112,154,74,26,27,0,111,147,51,110,216,
 1015:           43,45,4,100,215,152,195,118,96,22,34,1,184,170,42,166,238,109,
 1016:           187,138,196,147,102,205,116,83,241,174,227,232,156,148,60,153,3,
 1017:           175,128,115,192,36,103,191,239,58,222,192,172,190,239,92,8,131,

 1022: 
 1023:     %% Send dummy session ticket to trigger sending of pre_shared_key and
 1024:     %% psk_key_exchange_modes extensions.
 1025:     Client =
 1026:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1027:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1028:                                    {from, self()},
 1029:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1030:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1031:                                                                        {session_tickets, manual},
 1032:                                                                        {use_ticket, [DummyTicket]},
 1033:                                                                        {versions, ['tlsv1.3',
 1034:                                                                                    'tlsv1.2',
 1035:                                                                                    'tlsv1.1',
 1036:                                                                                    'tlsv1'
 1037:                                                                                   ]},
 1038:                                                                        {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3')},
 1039:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
 1040:                                                                       ],
 1041:                                                                       Config)},
 1042:                                    {continue_options,  proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
 1043: 
 1044:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1045: 
 1046:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1047:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 1049: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
 1050: handshake_continue_timeout() ->
 1051:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with short timeout"}].
 1052: handshake_continue_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1053:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1054:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1055:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1056: 
 1057:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1058:                                         {from, self()},
 1059:                                         {timeout, 1},
 1060:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true}, {handshake, hello},
 1061:                                                                             {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts],
 1062:                                                                            Config)},
 1063:                                         {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}
 1064:                                        ]),
 1065: 
 1066:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1067: 
 1068: 
 1069:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1070:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1071:                                      {from, self()},
 1072:                                      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1073:     
 1074:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,timeout}),
 1075:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1076: 
 1077: handshake_continue_change_verify() ->
 1078:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue with updated verify option. "
 1079:       "Use a verification that will fail to make sure verification is run"}].
 1080: handshake_continue_change_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1081:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1082:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1083:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1084: 
 1085:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1086:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1087:                 {from, self()},
 1088:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1089:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1090:                              {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1091:                 {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}]),
 1092: 
 1093:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1094: 
 1095:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
 1096:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1097:                 {host, Hostname},
 1098:                 {from, self()},
 1099:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1100:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1101:                              {server_name_indication, "foobar"},
 1102:                              {verify, verify_none}
 1103:                             | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1104:                 {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1105:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client,  handshake_failure).
 1106:

 1108: hello_client_cancel() ->
 1109:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the client side"}].
 1110: hello_client_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1111:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1112:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1113:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1114: 
 1115:     Server =
 1116:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1117:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1118:                                    {from, self()},
 1119:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1120:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1121:                                    {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1122:     
 1123:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1124: 
 1125:     %% That is ssl:handshake_cancel returns ok
 1126:     {connect_failed, ok} =
 1127:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1128:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1129:                                    {from, self()},
 1130:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello}
 1131:                                                                       | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1132:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1133:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, user_canceled).

 1167:     [_|_] = Versions = ssl:versions(),
 1168:     ?CT_LOG("~p~n", [Versions]).

 1170: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1171: 
 1172: versions_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1173:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default versions"}].
 1174: 
 1175: versions_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1176:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1177:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1178:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1179:     {Version, Versions} = test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni(TestVersion),
 1180:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1181:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, TestVersion),
 1182:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa) -> false;
 1183:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
 1184:                                                           (_) -> true
 1185:                                                        end}]),
 1186: 
 1187:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1188:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1189:               case ServerName of
 1190:                   SNI ->
 1191:                       [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts];
 1192:                   _ ->
 1193:                       ServerOpts
 1194:               end
 1195:           end,
 1196: 
 1197:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1198: 					{from, self()},
 1199: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, protocol_version_check, [Version]}},
 1200: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun},
 1201:                                                    {versions, Versions} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1202:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1203:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1204: 					{host, Hostname},
 1205: 					{from, self()},
 1206: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1207: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI}, {versions, Versions},
 1208:                                                    {ciphers, Ciphers}
 1209:                                                   | ClientOpts]}]),
 1210: 
 1211:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1212:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1213:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1214: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1215: 
 1216: ciphers_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1217:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default ciphers option"}].
 1218: 
 1219: ciphers_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1220:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1221:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1222:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1223:     Suites = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(TestVersion),
 1224:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1225: 
 1226:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1227:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1228:               case ServerName of
 1229:                   SNI ->
 1230:                       [{ciphers, Suites} | ServerOpts];
 1231:                   _ ->
 1232:                       ServerOpts
 1233:               end
 1234:           end,
 1235: 
 1236:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1237: 					{from, self()},
 1238: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, suite_check, [TestVersion]}},
 1239: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1240:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1241:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1242: 					{host, Hostname},
 1243: 					{from, self()},
 1244: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1245: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1246: 
 1247:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1248:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1249:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1250: 
 1251: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1252: %% Test case adapted from gen_tcp_misc_SUITE.
 1253: active_n() ->
 1254:     [{doc,"Test {active,N} option"}].
 1255: 
 1256: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1257:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1258:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1259:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1260:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1261:     N = 3,
 1262:     LS = ok(ssl:listen(Port, [{active,N}|ServerOpts])),
 1263:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS, [active])),
 1264:     active_n_common(LS, N),
 1265:     Self = self(),
 1266:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1267:         S0 = ok(ssl:transport_accept(LS)),
 1268:         {ok, S} = ssl:handshake(S0),
 1269:         ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1270:         [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 1271:         ssl:controlling_process(S, Self),
 1272:         Self ! {server, S}
 1273:     end),
 1274:     C = ok(ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{active,N}|ClientOpts])),
 1275:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active])),
 1276:     S = receive
 1277:         {server, S0} -> S0
 1278:     after
 1279:         1000 ->
 1280:             exit({error, connect})
 1281:     end,
 1282:     active_n_common(C, N),
 1283:     active_n_common(S, N),
 1284:     ok = ssl:setopts(C, [{active,N}]),
 1285:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1286:     ReceiveMsg = fun(Socket, Msg) ->
 1287:         receive
 1288:             {ssl,Socket,Msg} ->
 1289:                 ok;
 1290:             {ssl,Socket,Begin} ->
 1291:                 receive
 1292:                     {ssl,Socket,End} ->
 1293:                         Msg = Begin ++ End,
 1294:                         ok
 1295:                 after 1000 ->
 1296:                     exit(timeout)
 1297:                 end
 1298:         after 1000 ->
 1299:             exit(timeout)
 1300:         end
 1301:     end,
 1302:     repeat(3, fun(I) ->
 1303:         Msg = "message "++integer_to_list(I),
 1304:         ok = ssl:send(C, Msg),
 1305:         ReceiveMsg(S, Msg),
 1306:         ok = ssl:send(S, Msg),
 1307:         ReceiveMsg(C, Msg)
 1308:     end),
 1309:     receive
 1310:         {ssl_passive,S} ->
 1311:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active]))
 1312:     after
 1313:         1000 ->
 1314:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1315:     end,
 1316:     receive
 1317:         {ssl_passive,C} ->
 1318:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active]))
 1319:     after
 1320:         1000 ->
 1321:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1322:     end,
 1323:     LS2 = ok(ssl:listen(0, [{active,0}])),
 1324:     receive
 1325:         {ssl_passive,LS2} ->
 1326:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS2, [active]))
 1327:     after
 1328:         1000 ->
 1329:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1330:     end,
 1331:     ok = ssl:close(LS2),
 1332:     ok = ssl:close(C),
 1333:     ok = ssl:close(S),
 1334:     ok = ssl:close(LS),
 1335:     ok.
 1336: 
 1337: hibernate_client() ->
 1338:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on client side that is started with "
 1339:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity"}].
 1340: 
 1341: hibernate_client(Config) ->
 1342:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1343:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1344:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1345:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode},
 1346:                        {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 1347:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1348:                        {options, [{hibernate_after, infinity} | ServerOpts]}],
 1349:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1350:                        {from, self()},
 1351:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1352:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), false,
 1353:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1354:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, T, infinity) ||
 1355:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1356: 
 1357: hibernate_server() ->
 1358:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on server side that is started with "
 1359:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity."
 1360:       "Note: for DTLS test will not be stable, because cookie secret refresh "
 1361:       "mechanism might disturb hibernation of a server process."}].
 1362: hibernate_server(Config) ->
 1363:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1364:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1365:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1366:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1367:                        {from, self()},
 1368:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1369:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1370:                        {from, self()},
 1371:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1372:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), true,
 1373:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1374:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, infinity, T) ||
 1375:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1376: 
 1377: hibernate_helper(Version, CheckServer, StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1378:                  ServerOpts0, ClientOpts0,
 1379:                  ClientHibernateAfter, ServerHibernateAfter) ->
 1380:     AllServerOpts = StartServerOpts ++
 1381:         [{options, [{hibernate_after, ServerHibernateAfter} | ServerOpts0]}],
 1382:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(AllServerOpts),
 1383:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1384:     AllClientOpts = StartClientOpts ++
 1385:         [{port, Port},
 1386:          {options, [{hibernate_after, ClientHibernateAfter} | ClientOpts0]}],
 1387:     {Client, #sslsocket{pid = [ClientReceiverPid | ClientPotentialSenderPid]}} =
 1388:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(AllClientOpts),
 1389:     Results = ssl_test_lib:get_result([Client, Server]),
 1390:     {ok, ServerAcceptSocket} = proplists:get_value(Server, Results),
 1391:     ok = proplists:get_value(Client, Results),
 1392:     #sslsocket{pid = [ServerReceiverPid | ServerPotentialSenderPid]} =
 1393:         ServerAcceptSocket,
 1394:     {ReceiverPid, PotentialSenderPid, HibernateAfter} =
 1395:         case CheckServer of
 1396:             true -> {ServerReceiverPid, ServerPotentialSenderPid,
 1397:                      ServerHibernateAfter};
 1398:             false -> {ClientReceiverPid, ClientPotentialSenderPid,
 1399:                       ClientHibernateAfter}
 1400:         end,
 1401:     SleepAmount = max(1.5*HibernateAfter, 500),
 1402:     ?CT_LOG("HibernateAfter = ~w SleepAmount = ~w", [HibernateAfter, SleepAmount]),
 1403:     ct:sleep(SleepAmount), %% Schedule out
 1404:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1405: 	process_info(ReceiverPid, current_function),
 1406:     IsTls = ssl_test_lib:is_tls_version(Version),
 1407:     case IsTls of
 1408:         true ->
 1409:             [SenderPid] = PotentialSenderPid,
 1410:             {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1411:                 process_info(SenderPid, current_function);
 1412:         _ -> %% DTLS (no sender process)
 1413:             ok
 1414:     end,
 1415:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1416:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1417:     ok.
 1418: 
 1419: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1420: listen_socket() ->
 1421:     [{doc,"Check error handling and inet compliance when calling API functions with listen sockets."}].
 1422: 
 1423: listen_socket(Config) ->
 1424:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1425:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
 1426:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, ServerOpts, tls),
 1427:     %% This can be a valid thing to do as
 1428:     %% options are inherited by the accept socket
 1429:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(ListenSocket, self()),
 1430: 
 1431:     {ok, _} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1432: 
 1433:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:send(ListenSocket, <<"data">>),
 1434:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:recv(ListenSocket, 0),
 1435:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:connection_information(ListenSocket),
 1436:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peername(ListenSocket),
 1437:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peercert(ListenSocket),
 1438:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:renegotiate(ListenSocket),
 1439:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:export_key_materials(ListenSocket, [<<"Label">>], [<<"Context">>], 256),
 1440:     %% Legacy test
 1441:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:prf(ListenSocket, master_secret,
 1442:                                 <<"Label">>, [client_random, server_random], 256),
 1443:     case Protocol of
 1444:         tls ->
 1445:             {error, enotconn} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write);
 1446:         dtls ->
 1447:             {error, notsup} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write)
 1448:     end,
 1449:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
 1450: 
 1451: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1452: peername() ->
 1453:     [{doc,"Test API function peername/1"}].
 1454: 
 1455: peername(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1456:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1457:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1458:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1459: 
 1460:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1461:                [
 1462:                 {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1463:                 {from, self()},
 1464:                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1465:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1466:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1467:                           [return_socket,
 1468:                            {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1469:                            {host, Hostname},
 1470:                            {from, self()},
 1471:                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1472: 
 1473:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1474: 
 1475:     Server ! get_socket,
 1476:     SSocket =
 1477:         receive
 1478:             {Server, {socket, Socket}} ->
 1479:                 Socket
 1480:         end,
 1481: 
 1482:     {ok, ServerPeer} = ssl:peername(SSocket),
 1483:     ?CT_LOG("Server's peer: ~p~n", [ServerPeer]),
 1484:     {ok, ClientPeer} = ssl:peername(CSocket),
 1485:     ?CT_LOG("Client's peer: ~p~n", [ClientPeer]),
 1486: 
 1487:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1488:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1489: 
 1490: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1491: 
 1492: recv_active() ->
 1493:     [{doc,"Test recv on active socket"}].
 1494: 
 1495: recv_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1496:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1497:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1498:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1499:     Server = 
 1500: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1501: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1502: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1503: 				   {options,  [{active, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1504:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1505:     Client = 
 1506: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1507: 				   {host, Hostname},
 1508: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1509: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1510: 				   {options, [{active, true} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1511:         
 1512:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1513:     
 1514:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1515:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1516:

 1570:     [{doc,"Test ssl:recv timeout"}].

 1574:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1575: 
 1576:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1577: 
 1578:     Server =
 1579: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1580: 				   {from, self()},
 1581: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, send_recv_result_timeout_server, []}},
 1582: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1583:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1584: 
 1585:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1586: 					{host, Hostname},
 1587: 					{from, self()},
 1588: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
 1589: 					       send_recv_result_timeout_client, []}},
 1590: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1591: 
 1592:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
 1593:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1594:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 1596: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1597: recv_close() ->
 1598:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1599: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1600:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1601:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1602: 
 1603:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1604:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1605: 					  {from, self()},
 1606: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, do_recv_close, []}},
 1607: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1608:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1609:     {_Client, #sslsocket{} = SslSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1610: 									   {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1611: 									   {host, Hostname},
 1612: 									   {from, self()},
 1613: 									   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1614: 									   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1615:     ssl:close(SslSocket),
 1616:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1617:

 1627:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1628:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1629: 					  {from, self()},
 1630: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, no_recv_no_active, []}},
 1631: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),

 1634:                                         {host, Hostname},

 1641: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1642: controlling_process() ->
 1643:     [{doc,"Test API function controlling_process/2"}].
 1644: 
 1645: controlling_process(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1646:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1647:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1648:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1649:     ClientMsg = "Server hello",
 1650:     ServerMsg = "Client hello",
 1651:    
 1652:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([
 1653:                                         {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1654:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1655:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1656:                                                controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1657:                                                                             ServerMsg]}},
 1658:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1659:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1660:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1661:                                                    {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1662:                                                    {host, Hostname},
 1663:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1664: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1665: 				  controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1666: 							       ClientMsg]}},
 1667: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1668:     
 1669:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1670:     
 1671:     ServerMsg = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(CSocket, length(ServerMsg)),
 1672:     %% We do not have the TLS server socket but all messages form the client
 1673:     %% socket are now read, so ramining are form the server socket
 1674:     ClientMsg = ssl_active_recv(length(ClientMsg)),
 1675: 
 1676:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1677:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1678: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1679: controller_dies() ->
 1680:     [{doc,"Test that the socket is closed after controlling process dies"}].
 1681: controller_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1682:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1683:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1684:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1685:     ClientMsg = "Hello server",
 1686:     ServerMsg = "Hello client",
 1687: 
 1688:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1689: 					{from, self()}, 
 1690: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1691: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1692: 									ServerMsg]}},
 1693: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 1694:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1695:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1696: 					{host, Hostname},
 1697: 					{from, self()}, 
 1698: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1699: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1700: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1701: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 1702: 
 1703:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1704:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1705:     
 1706:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1707: 
 1708:     %% Test that clients die
 1709:     exit(Client, killed),
 1710:     get_close(Client, ?LINE),
 1711: 
 1712:     %% Test that clients die when process disappear
 1713:     Server ! listen, 
 1714:     Tester = self(),
 1715:     Connect = fun(Pid) ->
 1716: 		      {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
 1717: 		      %% Make sure server finishes and verification
 1718: 		      %% and is in coonection state before
 1719: 		      %% killing client
 1720: 		      ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1721: 		      Pid ! {self(), connected, Socket},
 1722: 		      receive die_nice -> normal end
 1723: 	      end,
 1724:     Client2 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1725:     receive {Client2, connected, _Socket} ->  Client2 ! die_nice end,
 1726:     
 1727:     get_close(Client2, ?LINE),
 1728:     
 1729:     %% Test that clients die when the controlling process have changed 
 1730:     Server ! listen, 
 1731: 
 1732:     Client3 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1733:     Controller = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die_nice -> normal end end),
 1734:     receive 
 1735: 	{Client3, connected, Socket} ->  
 1736: 	    ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Controller),
 1737: 	    Client3 ! die_nice 
 1738:     end,
 1739: 
 1740:     ?CT_LOG("Waiting on exit ~p~n",[Client3]),
 1741:     receive {'EXIT', Client3, normal} -> ok end,
 1742:     
 1743:     receive   %% Client3 is dead but that doesn't matter, socket should not be closed.
 1744: 	Unexpected ->
 1745: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 1746: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 1747:     after 1000 ->
 1748: 	    ok
 1749:     end,
 1750:     Controller ! die_nice,
 1751:     get_close(Controller, ?LINE),
 1752:     
 1753:     %% Test that servers die
 1754:     Server ! listen, 
 1755:     LastClient = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1756: 					    {host, Hostname},
 1757: 					    {from, self()}, 
 1758: 					    {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1759: 						   controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1760: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1761: 					    {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1762:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1763:     
 1764:     exit(Server, killed),
 1765:     get_close(Server, ?LINE),
 1766:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1767:     ssl_test_lib:close(LastClient).
 1768: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1769: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1770:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1771: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1772:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1773:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1774:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1775: 
 1776:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_control([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1777:                                                           {port, 0},
 1778:                                                           {from, self()},
 1779:                                                           {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1780:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1781:     
 1782:     _Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1783:                                               {host, Hostname},
 1784:                                               {from, self()},
 1785:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1786:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1787:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1788: 
 1789: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1790: close_with_timeout() ->
 1791:       [{doc,"Test normal (not downgrade) ssl:close/2"}].
 1792: close_with_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1793:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1794:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1795:     
 1796:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1797: 
 1798:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1799: 					{from, self()},
 1800: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1801: 					{options,[{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1802:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1803:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1804: 					{host, Hostname},
 1805: 					{from, self()},
 1806: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1807: 					{options, [{active, false} |ClientOpts]}]),
 1808: 
 1809:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).

 1811: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1812: close_in_error_state() ->
 1813:     [{doc,"Special case of closing socket in error state"}].
 1814: close_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1815:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1816:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1817:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1818: 
 1819:     _ = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server_close, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1820:     receive
 1821:         {_Pid, Port} ->
 1822:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1823:     end,
 1824:     receive
 1825:         ok ->
 1826:             ok;
 1827:         Other ->
 1828:             ct:fail(Other)
 1829:     end.
 1830: 
 1831: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1832: call_in_error_state() ->
 1833:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1834: call_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1835:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1836:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1837:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1838:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1839:     receive
 1840:         {Pid, Port} ->
 1841:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1842:     end,
 1843:     receive
 1844:         {error, closed} ->
 1845:             ok;
 1846:         Other ->
 1847:             ct:fail(Other)
 1848:     end.
 1849: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1850: close_transport_accept() ->
 1851:     [{doc,"Tests closing ssl socket when waiting on ssl:transport_accept/1"}].
 1852: 
 1853: close_transport_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1854:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1855:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1856: 
 1857:     Port = 0,
 1858:     Opts = [{active, false} | ServerOpts],
 1859:     {ok, ListenSocket} = rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, listen, [Port, Opts]),
 1860:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1861: 			ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1862: 			rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, close, [ListenSocket])
 1863: 	       end),
 1864:     case rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, transport_accept, [ListenSocket]) of
 1865: 	{error, closed} ->
 1866: 	    ok;
 1867: 	Other ->
 1868: 	    exit({?LINE, Other})
 1869:     end.
 1870: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1871: abuse_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1872:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1873: abuse_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1874:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1875:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1876:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1877: 
 1878:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_abuse_socket([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1879:                                                                {port, 0},
 1880:                                                                {from, self()},
 1881:                                                                {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1882:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1883:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1884:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1885:                                         {from, self()},
 1886:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1887:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1888:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1889:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1890:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
