 1893: 
 1894: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1895:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1896: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1897:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1898:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1899:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1900: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1901:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1902:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1903: 
 1904:     Server = 
 1905: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1906: 					 {from, self()},
 1907: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1908: 
 1909:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1910: 
 1911:     Client =
 1912: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1913: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1914: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1915: 
 1916:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1917:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1918:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1919:                               {error, closed}).
 1920: 
 1921: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1922: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1923:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1924: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1925:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1926:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1927:                        mac => aead,
 1928:                        prf => sha256},
 1929:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1930:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1931:                        mac => aead,
 1932:                        prf => sha384}],
 1933:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1934:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1935:                        mac => aead,
 1936:                        prf => sha384},
 1937:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1938:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1939:                        mac => aead,
 1940:                        prf => sha256}],
 1941:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1942:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1943:                                         cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1944:                                         mac => aead,
 1945:                                         prf => sha384}).
 1946: 
 1947: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1948: 
 1949: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1950:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1951: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1952:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1953:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1954:                        mac => aead,
 1955:                        prf => sha256},
 1956:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1957:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1958:                        mac => aead,
 1959:                        prf => sha384}],
 1960:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1961:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1962:                        mac => aead,
 1963:                        prf => sha384},
 1964:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1965:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1966:                        mac => aead,
 1967:                        prf => sha256}],
 1968:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 1969:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1970:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1971:                                         mac => aead,
 1972:                                         prf => sha256}).
 1973: 
 1974: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1975: honor_server_cipher_order() ->
 1976:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1977: honor_server_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1978:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1979:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1980:                        mac => sha,
 1981:                        prf => default_prf},
 1982:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1983:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1984:                        mac => sha,
 1985:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1986:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1987:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1988:                        mac => sha,
 1989:                        prf => default_prf},
 1990:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1991:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1992:                        mac => sha,
 1993:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1994:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1995:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1996:                                         cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1997:                                         mac => sha,
 1998:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1999:

 2006:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 2007:                        mac => sha,

 2011:                        mac => sha,
 2012:                        prf => default_prf}],
 2013:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 2014:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 2015:                        mac => sha,
 2016:                        prf => default_prf},
 2017:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 2018:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 2019:                        mac => sha,
 2020:                        prf => default_prf}],
 2021:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 2022:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 2023:                                         cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 2024:                                         mac => sha,

 2028: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2029: ipv6() ->
 2030:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 2031:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 2032: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2033:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 2034:     
 2035:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 2036: 	true ->
 2037: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2038: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2039: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 2040: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 2041: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2042: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 2043: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2044: 				   {options,  
 2045: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2046: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 2047: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2048: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2049: 				   {from, self()}, 
 2050: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2051: 				   {options, 
 2052: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2053: 	    
 2054: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2055: 	    
 2056: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2057: 	    
 2058: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2059: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 2060: 	false ->
 2061: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 2062:     end.
 2063: 
 2064: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2065: der_input() ->
 2066:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 2067: 
 2068: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2069:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2070:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 2071: 
 2072:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 2073:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 2074:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 2075:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 2076:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 2077:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2078:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 2079: 
 2080:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2081:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2082: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 2083:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2084:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2085: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 2086:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2087: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 2088: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 2089:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2090: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 2091:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2092:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2093: 					{from, self()},
 2094: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2095: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2096:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2097:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2098: 					{host, Hostname},
 2099: 					{from, self()},
 2100: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2101: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2102: 
 2103:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2104:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2105:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 2106:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2107:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2108: 
 2109:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2110:                    {dh, DHParams},
 2111:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 2112:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2113:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 2114:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2115:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 2116:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2117:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 2118:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2119:                                          {from, self()},
 2120:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2121:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 2122:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2123:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 2124:                                          {host, Hostname},
 2125:                                          {from, self()},
 2126:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2127:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 2128: 
 2129:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 2130:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 2131:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 2132:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2133:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2134: 
 2135:     ok.
 2136:

 2138: invalid_certfile() ->
 2139:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 2140: 
 2141: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2142:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2143:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2144:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2145:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 2146:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 2147:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2148: 
 2149: 
 2150:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2151:     
 2152:     Server = 
 2153: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2154: 					 {from, self()},
 2155: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2156: 
 2157:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2158: 
 2159:     Client =
 2160: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2161: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2162: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2163: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2164:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2165:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2166: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2167:     
 2168: 
 2169: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2170: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2171:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2172: 
 2173: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2174:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2175:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2176:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2177:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2178:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2179:     
 2180:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2181: 
 2182:     Server0  = 
 2183: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2184: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2185: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2186: 
 2187:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2188:     
 2189: 
 2190:     Client0 =
 2191: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2192: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2193: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2194: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2195: 
 2196:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2197:     
 2198:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2199: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2200:     
 2201:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2202:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2203:             
 2204:     Server1  = 
 2205: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2206: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2207: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2208: 
 2209:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2210:     
 2211:     Client1 =
 2212: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2213: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2214: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2215: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2216: 
 2217: 
 2218:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2219: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2220:     ok.
 2221: 
 2222: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2223: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2224:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2225: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2226:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2227:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2228:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2229:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2230: 
 2231:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2232:                                                          [{key_exchange,
 2233:                                                  fun(dhe_rsa) ->
 2234:                                                          true;
 2235:                                                     (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2236:                                                          true;
 2237:                                                     (rsa) ->
 2238:                                                          false;
 2239:                                                     (_) ->
 2240:                                                          false
 2241:                                                  end
 2242:                                                 }]),
 2243:     
 2244:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2245: 					{from, self()}, 
 2246: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2247: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2248: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2249: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2250:     
 2251:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2252:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2253: 					{host, Hostname},
 2254: 					{from, self()}, 
 2255: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2256: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2257:     
 2258:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2259: 
 2260:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2261:    
 2262:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2263:     
 2264:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2265:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2266: 
 2267: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2268: max_handshake_size() ->
 2269:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2270: 
 2271: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2272:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2273:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2274: 
 2275:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2276:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2277: 					{from, self()}, 
 2278: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2279: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2280:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2281:     
 2282:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2283: 					{host, Hostname},
 2284: 					{from, self()}, 
 2285: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2286: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2287:  
 2288:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2289:

 2291: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2292: 
 2293: -define(FUNC_CLAUSE(EXPR), try EXPR, error(should_fail) catch _:function_clause -> ok end).
 2294: 
 2295: options_not_proplist() ->
 2296:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2297: 
 2298: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2299:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2300: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2301:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2302: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2303: 					 BadOption]),
 2304:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443)),
 2305:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, infinity)),
 2306:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", [], infinity_misspelled)),
 2307:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", foo, [], infinity)),
 2308:     %% While at it test some other functions as well for regression testing
 2309:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:listen([], 443)),
 2310:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:transport_accept(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2311:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2312:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{})),
 2313:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{}, 1000)),
 2314:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, 1000, 1000)),
 2315:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [opt_list], [])),
 2316:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, [opt_list], [])),
 2317:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, 1000, 1000)),
 2318: 
 2319:     ok.
 2320: 
 2321: options_whitebox() ->
 2322:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2323: 
 2324: 
 2325: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2326:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2327:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2328:     DefOpts = case Role of
 2329:                   client ->
 2330:                       case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2331:                           undefined -> [{verify, verify_none}];
 2332:                           _ -> []
 2333:                       end;
 2334:                   server ->
 2335:                       Ciphers = proplists:get_value(ciphers, Opts, undefined),
 2336:                       Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, Opts, undefined),
 2337:                       Key = proplists:get_value(key, Opts, undefined),
 2338:                       CertsKeys = proplists:get_value(certs_keys, Opts, undefined),
 2339:                       NoCertOrKeys = Cert == undefined orelse Key == undefined andalso
 2340:                           CertsKeys == undefined,
 2341:                       if Ciphers == undefined andalso NoCertOrKeys ->
 2342:                               [{certs_keys, [#{cert => <<>>, key => {rsa, <<>>}}]}];
 2343:                          true ->
 2344:                               []
 2345:                       end
 2346:               end,
 2347:     NoVerify = case Role of
 2348:                    client -> [{verify, verify_none}|DefOpts];
 2349:                    server -> DefOpts
 2350:                end,
 2351:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2352:         dtls ->
 2353:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{protocol, dtls}|NoVerify], Role, Host),
 2354:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts};
 2355:         tls ->
 2356:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2357:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2358:                 undefined ->
 2359:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2360:                 _ ->
 2361:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2362:             end;
 2363:         _ ->
 2364:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2365:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2366:     end.
 2367: 
 2368: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2369: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2370:         fun() ->
 2371:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2372:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2373:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2374:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2375:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL)),
 2376:                         check_expected(__ALL, ssl:update_options([], Role, __ALL));
 2377:                     Other ->
 2378:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2379:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2380:                 catch
 2381:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2382:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2383:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2384:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2385:                 end,
 2386:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2387:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2388:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2));
 2389:                     Other2 ->
 2390:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2391:                                "ssl:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2392:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2393:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2394:                 catch
 2395:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2396:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2397:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2398:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2399:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2400:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2401:                 end
 2402:         end()).
 2403: 
 2404: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2405:         fun() ->
 2406:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2407:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2408:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2409:                     Other ->
 2410:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2411:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2412:                 catch
 2413:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2414:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2415:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2416:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2417:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2418:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2419:                 end,
 2420:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2421:                     Other2 ->
 2422:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2423:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2424:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2425:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2426:                 catch
 2427:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2428:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2429:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2430:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2431:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2432:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2433:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2434:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2435:                 end
 2436:         end()).
 2437: 
 2438: -define(ERR_UPD(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2439:         fun() ->
 2440:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2441:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2442:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2443:                     {ok, #config{}} ->
 2444:                         ok;
 2445:                     Other ->
 2446:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2447:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2448:                 catch
 2449:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2450:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2451:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2452:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2453:                 end,
 2454:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2455:                     Other2 ->
 2456:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2457:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2458:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2459:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2460:                 catch
 2461:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2462:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2463:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2464:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2465:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2466:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2467:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2468:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2469:                 end
 2470:         end()).
 2471: 
 2472: check_expected(A, A) ->
 2473:     ok;
 2474: check_expected(A, B) when is_list(A), is_list(B) ->
 2475:     Diff1 = A -- B,
 2476:     Diff2 = B -- A,
 2477:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2478:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2479:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2480:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2481:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2482:        true ->
 2483:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2484:     end;
 2485: check_expected(A, B) when is_map(A), is_map(B) ->
 2486:     Diff1 = [{KeyA, ValA}
 2487:              || KeyA := ValA <- A, ValA =/= maps:get(KeyA, B, missing_key_val)],
 2488:     Diff2 = [{KeyB, ValB}
 2489:              || KeyB := ValB <- B, ValB =/= maps:get(KeyB, A, missing_key_val)],
 2490:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2491:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2492:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2493:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2494:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2495:        true ->
 2496:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2497:     end;
 2498: check_expected({ok, Term1}, {ok, Term2}) ->
 2499:     check_expected(Term1, Term2);
 2500: check_expected(A, B) ->
 2501:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n~p~n", [A,B]),
 2502:     ct:fail(not_equal).
 2503: 
 2504: 
 2505: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2506:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2507:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2508:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2509:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2510:     options_protocol(Config),
 2511:     options_version(Config),
 2512:     options_alpn(Config),
 2513:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2514:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2515:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2516:     options_cert(Config),
 2517:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2518:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2519:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2520:     options_cookie(Config),
 2521:     options_crl(Config),
 2522:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2523:     options_dh(Config),
 2524:     options_early_data(Config),
 2525:     options_eccs(Config),
 2526:     options_verify(Config),
 2527:     options_fallback(Config),
 2528:     options_handshake(Config),
 2529:     options_process(Config),
 2530:     options_honor(Config),
 2531:     options_debug(Config),
 2532:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2533:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2534:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2535:     options_stapling(Config),
 2536:     options_padding(Config),
 2537:     options_identity(Config),
 2538:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2539:     options_sni(Config),
 2540:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2541:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2542:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2543:     ok.
 2544: 
 2545: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2546:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2547:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2548:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2549: 
 2550:     %% Errors
 2551:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2552: 
 2553:     begin %% erl_dist
 2554:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2555:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2556:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2557:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2558:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2559:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2560:     end,
 2561:     ok.
 2562: 
 2563: options_version(_Config) ->
 2564:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2565:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2566: 
 2567:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2568:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2569:         client),
 2570:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2571: 
 2572:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2573:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2574:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2575: 
 2576: 
 2577:     %% Errors
 2578:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2579:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2580: 
 2581:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2582:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2583:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2584:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2585: 
 2586:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2587:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2588:          client),
 2589:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2590:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2591:          client),
 2592:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2593:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2594:          client),
 2595:     ok.
 2596: 
 2597: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2598:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2599:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2600:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2601:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2602:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2603: 
 2604:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2605:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2606:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2607:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2608: 
 2609:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2610: 
 2611:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2612:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2613:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2614:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2615:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2616: 
 2617:     %% Errors
 2618:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2619:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2620:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2621:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2622:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2623:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2624:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2625:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2626:     ok.
 2627: 
 2628: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2629:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2630:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2631:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2632:         server),
 2633:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2634:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2635:         server),
 2636:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2637:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2638:         server),
 2639:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2640:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2641:         server),
 2642: 
 2643: 
 2644:     %% Errors
 2645:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2646:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2647:          client),
 2648:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2649:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2650:          server),
 2651:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2652:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2653:          server),
 2654:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2655:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2656:          server),
 2657:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2658:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2659:          server),
 2660:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2661:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2662:          server),
 2663:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2664:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2665:          server),
 2666:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2667:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2668:          server),
 2669:     ok.
 2670: 
 2671: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2672:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),
 2673: 
 2674:     ?OK(#{}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']}], client, [beast_mitigation]),
 2675:     ?OK(#{}, [{beast_mitigation, disabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2676:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := zero_n}, [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2677: 
 2678:     %% Errors
 2679:     ?ERR({beast_mitigation, enabled},
 2680:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2681:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [beast_mitigation, {versions, _}]},
 2682:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),
 2683:     ok.
 2684: 
 2685: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2686:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2687:     File = case os:type() of
 2688:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2689:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2690:            end,
 2691:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2692:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2693:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2694:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2695:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2696:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2697:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2698:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2699:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2700: 
 2701:     %% Errors
 2702:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2703:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2704:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2705: 
 2706:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2707:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2708:     %% Error
 2709:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2710:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2711:     ok.
 2712: 
 2713: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2714:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2715:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2716:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2717:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2718:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2719:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2720:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2721: 
 2722:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2723: 
 2724:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2725:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2726:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2727:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2728:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2729:         [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2730:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client, Old),
 2731:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2732:         [{key, #{algorithm => ecdsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}}],
 2733:         client, Old),
 2734:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2735:         [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2736:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2737:                  encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end}},
 2738:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}], client, Old),
 2739:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2740:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2741:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2742:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2743: 
 2744:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2745:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2746: 
 2747:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []},
 2748:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2749:         client, Old),
 2750: 
 2751:     %% Errors
 2752:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]},
 2753:          [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2754:           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], client),
 2755:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2756:          [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2757:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2758:                   encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end
 2759:                  }}], client),
 2760:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2761:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2762:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2763:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{certs_keys, []}], server),
 2764:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2765:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2766:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2767:     ok.
 2768: 
 2769: options_certificate_authorities(_Config) ->
 2770:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2771:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2772:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := true}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], client),
 2773:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2774:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], server),
 2775:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2776: 
 2777:     %% Errors
 2778:     ?ERR({certificate_authorities, []},
 2779:          [{certificate_authorities,  []}], client),
 2780:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [certificate_authorities, {versions, _}]},
 2781:          [{certificate_authorities, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}],
 2782:          client),
 2783:     ok.
 2784: 
 2785: options_ciphers(_Config) ->
 2786:     CipherSuite = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(?TLS_1_2),
 2787:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [], client),
 2788:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, CipherSuite}], client),
 2789:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2790:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA", "RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2791: 
 2792:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["TLS_DH_anon_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA256"]}], server),
 2793:     %% Errors
 2794:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, "foobar:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2795:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5", "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2796:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], server),
 2797:     ok.
 2798: 
 2799: options_client_renegotiation(_Config) ->
 2800:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := true}, [], server),
 2801:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := false}, [{client_renegotiation, false}], server),
 2802: 
 2803:     %% Errors
 2804:     ?ERR({client_renegotiation, []}, [{client_renegotiation,  []}], server),
 2805:     ?ERR({option, server_only, client_renegotiation}, [{client_renegotiation, true}], client),
 2806:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [client_renegotiation, {versions, _}]},
 2807:          [{client_renegotiation, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2808:          server),
 2809:     ok.
 2810: 
 2811: 
 2812: options_cookie(_Config) ->
 2813:     ?OK(#{cookie := true},  [], server),
 2814:     ?OK(#{cookie := false}, [{cookie, false}], server),
 2815: 
 2816:     %% Errors
 2817:     ?ERR({cookie, []}, [{cookie,  []}], server),
 2818:     ?ERR({option, server_only, cookie}, [{cookie, true}], client),
 2819:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [cookie, {versions, _}]},
 2820:          [{cookie, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2821:     ok.
 2822: 
 2823: options_crl(_Config) ->
 2824:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := false}, [], server),
 2825:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := true},  [{crl_check, true}], server),
 2826:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2827:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {internal, [{dir, "/tmp"}]}}}],
 2828:         server),
 2829:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2830:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}}],
 2831:         server),
 2832:     %% Errors
 2833:     ?ERR({crl_check, foo}, [{crl_check, foo}], server),
 2834:     ?ERR({crl_cache, {a,b,c}}, [{crl_cache, {a,b,c}}], server),
 2835:     ok.
 2836: 
 2837: options_hostname_check(_Config) ->
 2838:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := []}, [], client),
 2839:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := [{match_fun, _}]},
 2840:         [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, fun() -> ok end}]}],
 2841:         client),
 2842:     %% Error
 2843:     ?ERR({customize_hostname_check, _}, [{customize_hostname_check, {match_fun, pb_fun}}], client),
 2844:     ok.
 2845: 
 2846: options_dh(_Config) -> %% dh dhfile
 2847:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [dh, dhfile]),
 2848:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2849:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}, [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dh]),
 2850:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}, {dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2851: 
 2852:     %% Should be an error
 2853:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>},  %% Not available in 1.3
 2854:         [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server, [dh]),
 2855: 
 2856:     %% Error
 2857:     ?ERR({dh, not_a_bin}, [{dh, not_a_bin}], server),
 2858:     ?ERR({dhfile, not_a_filename}, [{dhfile, not_a_filename}], server),
 2859:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dhfile}, [{dhfile, "file"}], client),
 2860:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dh}, [{dh, <<"DER">>}], client),
 2861:     ok.
 2862: 
 2863: options_early_data(_Config) -> %% early_data, session_tickets and use_ticket
 2864:     ?OK(#{early_data := undefined, session_tickets := disabled},
 2865:         [], client),
 2866:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled, session_tickets := disabled, stateless_tickets_seed := undefined},
 2867:         [], server),
 2868: 
 2869:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := auto},
 2870:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2871:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := manual, use_ticket := [<<1>>]},
 2872:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, [<<1>>]}],
 2873:         client),
 2874: 
 2875:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2876:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2877:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2878:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2879: 
 2880:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled}, [{early_data, disabled}], server),
 2881: 
 2882:     %% Errors
 2883:     ?ERR({option, client_only, use_ticket}, [{use_ticket, []}], server),
 2884:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{use_ticket, [<<>>]}], client),
 2885: 
 2886:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, foo}}, [{session_tickets, foo}], server),
 2887:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, manual}}, [{session_tickets, manual}], server),
 2888:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, stateful}}, [{session_tickets, stateful}], client),
 2889:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2890:          [{session_tickets, stateful}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2891:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2892:          [{session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2893: 
 2894:     ?ERR({use_ticket, foo},
 2895:          [{use_ticket, foo}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2896: 
 2897:     ?ERR({early_data,undefined}, [{early_data, undefined}], client),
 2898:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2899:          [{early_data, <<>>}], client),
 2900:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, enabled}},
 2901:          [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2902:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, _, {use_ticket, _}]},
 2903:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2904: 
 2905:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2906:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),
 2907:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2908:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),
 2909:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2910:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}], server),
 2911: 
 2912:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]},
 2913:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful}],
 2914:          server),
 2915:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}]},
 2916:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}],
 2917:          server),
 2918:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2919:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2920:          server),
 2921:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2922:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2923:          server),
 2924:     ?ERR({option, server_only, stateless_tickets_seed},
 2925:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], client),
 2926:     ok.

 2928: options_eccs(_Config) ->
 2929:     Curves = tl(ssl:eccs()),
 2930:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [], client),
 2931:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [{eccs, Curves}], client),
 2932: 
 2933:     %% Errors
 2934:     ?ERR({eccs, not_a_list}, [{eccs, not_a_list}], client),
 2935:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, []}], client),
 2936:     ?ERR({options,{eccs,[foo]}}, [{eccs, [foo]}], client),
 2937:     ok.
 2938: 
 2939: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2940:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2941:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2942: 
 2943:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2944:         [], server),
 2945:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2946:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2947:         server),
 2948:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2949:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2950: 
 2951:     %% Test ssl option handling. Option values are verified by public_key tests
 2952:     CertPolicyOpts = [{policy_set, [?anyPolicy]}, {explicit_policy, false}],
 2953: 
 2954:     ?OK(#{cert_policy_opts := CertPolicyOpts}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, CertPolicyOpts}],
 2955:         client),
 2956: 
 2957:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2958:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2959:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 2960:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2961:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 2962:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2963:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2964:         server),
 2965:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2966:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2967:         server),
 2968: 
 2969: 
 2970:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 2971:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 2972:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 2973:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 2974:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 2975: 
 2976:     %% Errors
 2977:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 2978:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 2979:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 2980:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 2981:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 2982:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2983:          client),
 2984:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 2985:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2986:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 2987:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 2988:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {foo, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{foo,bar}]}],
 2989:         client),
 2990:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {explicit_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy,bar}]}],
 2991:          client),
 2992:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_policy_mapping, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy, true},
 2993:                                                                                                                            {inhibit_policy_mapping,bar}]}],
 2994:          client),
 2995:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_any_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{inhibit_any_policy,bar}]}],
 2996:          client),
 2997:     ok.

 3005:     ?ERR({fallback, []},  [{fallback, []}], client),
 3006:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [fallback, {versions, _}]},
 3007:          [{fallback, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 3008:     ok.

 3133: options_identity(_Config) ->  %% psk_identity  srp_identity and user_lookup_fun
 3134:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3135:         [], client),
 3136:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := <<"foobar">>, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3137:         [{psk_identity, "foobar"}], server),
 3138:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3139:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], client),
 3140:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := {_, args}},
 3141:         [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}], client),
 3142: 
 3143:     %% Should fail client option only
 3144:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3145:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], server),
 3146: 
 3147:     %% Errors
 3148:     ?ERR({srp_identity, {_,_}},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3149:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 3150:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3151:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),
 3152:     ?ERR({srp_identity, _}, [{srp_identity, "user"}], client),
 3153:     ?ERR({user_lookup_fun, _},
 3154:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_) -> ok end, args}}],
 3155:          client),
 3156: 
 3157:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [psk_identity, _]},
 3158:          [{psk_identity, "foobar"},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3159:          server),
 3160:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [srp_identity, _]},
 3161:          [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3162:          client),
 3163:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun, _]},
 3164:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3165:          client),
 3166:     ok.

 3175:         [{reuse_session, {<<>>, <<>>}}, {reuse_sessions, false}], client),
 3176: 
 3177:     RS_F = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3178:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := RS_F, reuse_sessions := false},
 3179:         [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {reuse_sessions, false}],
 3180:         server),

 3188:          server),

 3190:          [{reuse_session, RS_F},{reuse_sessions, false}],
 3191:          client),

 3193:     ?ERR({reuse_session, foo},  [{reuse_session, foo}], server),
 3194:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, save}, [{reuse_sessions, save}], server),
 3195:     ?ERR({reuse_session, <<>>}, [{reuse_session, <<>>}], server),
 3196: 
 3197:     ok.

 3199: options_sni(_Config) -> %% server_name_indication
 3200:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.host.org"}, [], client),
 3201:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [server_name_indication]),
 3202:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := disable}, [{server_name_indication, disable}], client),
 3203:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.org"}, [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], client),
 3204: 
 3205:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3206: 
 3207:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3208:     SNI_F = fun(_) -> sni end,
 3209:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := SNI_F}, [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3210: 
 3211:     %% Errors
 3212:     ?ERR({option, client_only, server_name_indication},
 3213:          [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], server),
 3214:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_hosts},  [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], client),
 3215:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_fun},  [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], client),
 3216: 
 3217:     ?ERR({server_name_indication, foo},  [{server_name_indication, foo}], client),
 3218:     ?ERR({sni_hosts, foo}, [{sni_hosts, foo}], server),
 3219:     ?ERR({sni_fun, foo}, [{sni_fun, foo}], server),
 3220: 
 3221:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [sni_fun, sni_hosts]},
 3222:          [{sni_fun, SNI_F}, {sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server),
 3223:     ok.
 3224: 
 3225: options_sign_alg(_Config) ->  %% signature_algs[_cert]
 3226:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [_|_]},
 3227:         [], client),
 3228:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 3229:         [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}]}], client),
 3230:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]},
 3231:         [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}],
 3232:         client),
 3233: 
 3234:     %% Errors
 3235:     ?ERR({signature_algs, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs, not_a_list}], client),
 3236:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}], client),
 3237:     ?ERR({signature_algs, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs, [foobar]}], client),
 3238:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}], client),
 3239:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3240:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3241:          client),
 3242:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3243:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3244:          server),
 3245:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3246:          [{signature_algs, []}], client),
 3247:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}},
 3248:          [{signature_algs_cert, []}],
 3249:          client),
 3250:     ok.
 3251: 
 3252: options_supported_groups(_Config) ->
 3253:     Default = ssl:groups(default),
 3254:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, Default}},
 3255:         [], client),
 3256:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}},
 3257:         [{supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}], client),
 3258: 
 3259:     %% ERRORs
 3260:     ?ERR({{'tlvs1.2'},{versions,[{'tlvs1.2'}]}},
 3261:          [{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [{'tlvs1.2'}]}], client),
 3262:     ?ERR({supported_groups, not_a_list}, [{supported_groups, not_a_list}], client),
 3263:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, []}], client),
 3264:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, [foo]}], client),
 3265:     ok.
 3266: 
 3267: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3268:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3269:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3270:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3271:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3272:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3273:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3274:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3275:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3276:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3277:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3278:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3279:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3280: 
 3281:     %% invalid parameters
 3282:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3283:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3284:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3285:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3286:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3287:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3288:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3289:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3290:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3291:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3292:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3293:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3294: 
 3295:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3296:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3297:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3298:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3299:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3300:     ok.
 3301: 
 3302: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3303: 
 3304: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3305:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3306: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3307:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3308:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3309:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3310:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3311:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3312:     
 3313:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3314:     
 3315:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3316: 					      {from, self()},
 3317: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3318:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3319:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3320:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3321:                                               {from, self()},
 3322:                                               {options,
 3323:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3324:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3325: 
 3326:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3327: 
 3328: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3329: cb_info() ->
 3330:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3331: 
 3332: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3333:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3334:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3335:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3336:     CbInfo =
 3337:         case Protocol of
 3338:             tls ->
 3339:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3340:             dtls ->
 3341:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3342:         end,
 3343:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3344:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3345:                                         {from, self()},
 3346:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3347:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3348:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3349: 
 3350:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3351:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3352:                                         {from, self()},
 3353:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3354:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3355: 
 3356:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3357: 
 3358: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3359: log_alert() ->
 3360:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3361:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3362: 
 3363: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3364:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3365:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3366: 
 3367:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3368:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3369:                                         {from, self()},
 3370:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3371:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3372:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3373:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3374:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3375:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3376:                                                  {from, self()},
 3377:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3378:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3379:     
 3380:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3381:     
 3382:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3383: 
 3384: 
 3385: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3386: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3387: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3388: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3389: %% code has been run.
 3390:    
 3391: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3392:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3393: 
 3394: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3395:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3396:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3397:     
 3398:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3399: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3400: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3401:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3402: 
 3403: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3404:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3405:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3406:     
 3407:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3408: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3409: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3410:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3411: 
 3412: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3413:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3414:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3415:     
 3416:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3417:

 3420: supported_groups() ->
 3421:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3422: 
 3423: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3424:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3425:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3426: 
 3427:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3428: 
 3429:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3430: 					{from, self()},
 3431:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3432:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3433:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3434:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3435: 					{host, Hostname},
 3436:                                         {from, self()},
 3437:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3438:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3439: 
 3440:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3441: 
 3442:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3443:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 3446: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3447:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3448: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3449:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3450:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3451:                        mac => aead,
 3452:                        prf => sha384},
 3453:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3454:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3455:                        mac => aead,
 3456:                        prf => sha256}],
 3457:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3458:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3459:                        mac => aead,
 3460:                        prf => sha256},
 3461:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3462:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3463:                        mac => aead,
 3464:                        prf => sha384}],
 3465:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3466:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3467:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3468:                                                                       prf => sha384}).

 3515:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3516:                           {options,incompatible,
 3517:                            [early_data,{session_tickets,disabled}]}),
 3518:

 3520:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3521:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3522:                           {options, {session_tickets, stateful}}),
 3523:

 3525:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3526:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3527:                           {options,incompatible,
 3528:                            [early_data, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, undefined}]}),
 3529:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3530:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3531:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3532:                                    {early_data, "test"}],
 3533:                           {options, {early_data, "test"}}),
 3534:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3535:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3536:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3537:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3538:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3539:                           econnrefused),
 3540: 
 3541:     %% All options are ok but there is no server

 3543:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3544:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3545:                           econnrefused).

 3607:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3608:                           {options, incompatible,
 3609:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]}),
 3610: 
 3611:     InvalidSeed1 = 12345,

 3613:                                    {session_tickets, stateless},
 3614:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}],
