 3618: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3619:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3620: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3621:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3622:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3623:                        mac => aead,
 3624:                        prf => sha384},
 3625:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3626:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3627:                        mac => aead,
 3628:                        prf => sha256}],
 3629:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3630:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3631:                        mac => aead,
 3632:                        prf => sha256},
 3633:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3634:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3635:                        mac => aead,
 3636:                        prf => sha384}],
 3637:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 3638:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3639:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3640:                                         mac => aead,
 3641:                                         prf => sha256}).
 3642: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3643: getstat() ->
 3644:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3645: 
 3646: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3647:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3648:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3649:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3650:     
 3651:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3652:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3653:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3654:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3655: 
 3656:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3657: 					{from, self()},
 3658:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3659:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3660:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3661:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3662: 					{host, Hostname},
 3663:                                         {from, self()},
 3664:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3665:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3666:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3667: 
 3668: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3669:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3670: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3671:     TestOpts =
 3672:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3673:           {options, incompatible,
 3674:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3675:           common},
 3676: 
 3677:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3678:           {options, incompatible,
 3679:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3680:           server},
 3681: 
 3682:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3683:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3684:           {options, incompatible,
 3685:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3686:           client},
 3687: 
 3688:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3689:           {options, incompatible,
 3690:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3691:           server
 3692:          },
 3693: 
 3694:          {{cookie, false},
 3695:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3696:           client
 3697:          },
 3698: 
 3699:          {{padding_check, false},
 3700:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3701:           common},
 3702: 
 3703:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3704:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3705:           common},
 3706: 
 3707:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3708:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3709:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3710:           common},
 3711: 
 3712:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3713:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3714:           server},
 3715: 
 3716:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3717:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3718:           client},
 3719: 
 3720:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3721:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3722:           common},
 3723: 
 3724:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3725:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3726:           common},
 3727: 
 3728:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3729:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3730:           client}
 3731:         ],
 3732: 
 3733:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3734:                   case Type of
 3735:                       server ->
 3736:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3737:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3738:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3739:                       client ->
 3740:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3741:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3742:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3743:                       common ->
 3744:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3745:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3746:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3747:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3748:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3749:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3750:                   end
 3751:           end,
 3752:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3753: 
 3754: 
 3755: ssl_not_started() ->
 3756:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3757: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3758:     application:stop(ssl),
 3759:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3760:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 3761:     Opts = [{verify, verify_none},
 3762:             {versions, [Version]},
 3763:             {protocol, Protocol}],
 3764:     try
 3765:         {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, Opts)
 3766:     after
 3767:         ssl:start()
 3768:     end,
 3769:     ok.
 3770: 
 3771: cookie() ->
 3772:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3773: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3774:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3775:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3776: 
 3777: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3778: check_random_nonce() ->
 3779:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3780:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3781: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3782:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3783:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3784:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3785:     N = 10,
 3786:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3787:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3788:                                          Hostname)
 3789:         end,
 3790:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3791:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3792:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3793:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3794:                  {_FromPid,
 3795:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3796:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3797:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3798:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3799:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3800:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3801:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3802:         _ ->
 3803:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3804:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3805:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3806:     end,
 3807:     [begin
 3808:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3809:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3810:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3811: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3812: cipher_listing() ->
 3813:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3814:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3815:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3816: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3817:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3818:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3819: 
 3820: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3821: format_error() ->
 3822:     "".
 3823: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3824:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3825:               {error, closed},
 3826:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3827:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3828:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3829:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3830:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3831:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3832:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3833:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3834:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3835:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3836:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3837:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3838:              ],
 3839:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3840:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3841:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3842:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3843:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3844:             end,
 3845:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3846:     ok.
 3847: 
 3848: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3849: 
 3850: export_key_materials() ->
 3851:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3852: 
 3853: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3854:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3855:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3856:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3857:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3858:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3859: 
 3860:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3861: 
 3862:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3863:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3864:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3865:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3866:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3867:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3868:     Server ! get_socket,
 3869:     ServerS = receive
 3870:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3871:               end,
 3872: 
 3873:     case Version of
 3874:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3875:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3876:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3877:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3878:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3879:         _ ->
 3880:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3881:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3882:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3883:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3884:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3885:     end.
 3886: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3887: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3888:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3889: 
 3890: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3891:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3892:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3893:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3894:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3895:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3896: 
 3897:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3898:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3899:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3900:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3901: 
 3902:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3903:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3904:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3905:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3906:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3907:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3908:     Server ! get_socket,
 3909:     ServerS = receive
 3910:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3911:               end,
 3912: 
 3913:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3914:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3915:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3916:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3917: 
 3918: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3919: 
 3920: legacy_prf() ->
 3921:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3922: 
 3923: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3924:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3925:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3926:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3927:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3928:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3929: 
 3930:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3931:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3932:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3933:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3934:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3935: 
 3936:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3937: 
 3938:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 3939:                     [return_socket,
 3940:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3941:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3942:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3943:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3944:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3945:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3946: 
 3947:     Server ! get_socket,
 3948:     ServerS = receive
 3949:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3950:               end,
 3951: 
 3952:     case Version of
 3953:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3954:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3955:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 3956:         _ ->
 3957:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3958:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3959:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3960:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3961:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 3962:     end.
 3963: 
 3964: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3965: 
 3966: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 3967:     Server =
 3968:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3969:                                    {from, self()},
 3970:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3971:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 3972:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3973: 
 3974:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3975:     Client =
 3976:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 3977:                                    {host, Hostname},
 3978:                                    {from, self()},
 3979:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3980:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 3981:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 3982: 
 3983:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 3984:     {Server, Client}.
 3985: 
 3986: %%% Checker functions
 3987: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 3988:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 3989:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 3990: secs_since_1970() ->
 3991:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 3992:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 3993: 
 3994: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 3995:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3996:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 3997: 	true -> 
 3998: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 3999: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 4000: 	    ok;
 4001: 	false ->
 4002: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 4003:     end.
 4004: 
 4005: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4006:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 4007:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 4008:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 4009: 
 4010: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 4011:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 4012:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 4013:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 4014: 
 4015: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 4016:     {ok, Keylog};
 4017: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 4018:     {ok, Keylog};
 4019: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 4020:     {ok, Keylog};
 4021: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 4022:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 4023: 
 4024: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 4025:     ok;
 4026: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 4027:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 4028:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 4029:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 4030:         Username ->
 4031: 	        ok;
 4032:         not_found ->
 4033:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 4034:     end.
 4035: 
 4036: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 4037: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 4038: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 4039:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 4040:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 4041: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 4042:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 4043: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 4044:     false.
 4045: 
 4046: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 4047:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4048:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4049:     ok.
 4050: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 4051:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4052:     ok.
 4053: 
 4054: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 4055:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 4056:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 4057:     %% before message is sent
 4058:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 4059:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 4060:     no_result_msg.
 4061: 
 4062: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 4063:     receive Result -> Result end.
 4064: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 4065:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4066:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4067:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4068:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4069:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4070:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 4071:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4072:     receive
 4073: 	Msg ->
 4074: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 4075:     after 500 ->
 4076: 	    ok
 4077:     end,
 4078:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4079:     ok.
 4080: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 4081:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 4082:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4083:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 4084:     ok.
 4085: 
 4086: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 4087:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4088:     receive
 4089: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 4090: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 4091:     after 500 ->
 4092: 	    ok
 4093:     end.
 4094: 
 4095: tls_close(Socket) ->
 4096:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 4097:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 4098:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 4099:     %% function will be called by both client
 4100:     %% and server in the test.
 4101:     ct:sleep(100),
 4102:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 4103:         ok ->
 4104:             ok;
 4105:         {error, closed} ->
 4106:             ok;
 4107:         Other ->
 4108:             ct:fail(Other)
 4109:     end.
 4110: 
 4111: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 4112:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4113:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4114:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4115:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4116:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 4117: 
 4118: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 4119:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4120:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4121:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4122:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4123:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 4124: 
 4125: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 4126:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 4127: 
 4128: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 4129:     receive
 4130:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 4131:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 4132:     after 5000 ->
 4133:             ok
 4134:     end.
 4135: 
 4136: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4137:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 4138:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 4139: 
 4140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4141: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 4142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4143: 
 4144: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 4145:     dtls;
 4146: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 4147:     dtls;
 4148: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 4149:     tls.
 4150: 
 4151: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 4152:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 4153:     receive
 4154:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4155:     after
 4156:         1000 ->
 4157:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4158:     end,
 4159:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4160:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 4161:     receive
 4162:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4163:     after
 4164:         1000 ->
 4165:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4166:     end,
 4167:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 4168:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 4169:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 4170:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 4171:     receive
 4172:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4173:     after
 4174:         1000 ->
 4175:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4176:     end,
 4177:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4178:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4179:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 4180:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4181:     receive
 4182:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4183:     after
 4184:         0 ->
 4185:             ok
 4186:     end,
 4187:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4188:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 4189:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4190:     receive
 4191:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4192:     after
 4193:         0 ->
 4194:             ok
 4195:     end,
 4196:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 4197:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 4198:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4199:     ok.
 4200: 
 4201: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 4202: 
 4203: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 4204:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 4205:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 4206:     Repeat(N).
 4207: 
 4208: 
 4209: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 4210:     receive
 4211: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 4212: 	    receive
 4213: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 4214: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 4215: 		Unexpected ->
 4216: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4217: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4218: 	    after 5000 ->
 4219: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4220: 	    end;
 4221: 	Unexpected ->
 4222: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4223: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4224:     after 5000 ->
 4225: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4226:     end.
 4227: 
 4228: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 4229:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4230: 
 4231: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4232:     Acc;
 4233: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4234:     receive 
 4235: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4236:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4237:     end.
 4238: 
 4239: 
 4240: 
 4241: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4242:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4243:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4244: 
 4245:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4246: 
 4247:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4248: 					{from, self()},
 4249: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4250: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4251: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4252:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4253:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4254: 					{host, Hostname},
 4255: 					{from, self()},
 4256: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4257: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4258: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4259: 
 4260:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4261: 
 4262:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4263: 
 4264:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4265: 
 4266:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4267:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4268: 
 4269: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4270:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4271:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4272:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4273: 
 4274:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4275: 
 4276:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4277:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4278: 					{from, self()},
 4279: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4280:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4281:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4282:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4283:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4284:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4285: 					{host, Hostname},
 4286: 					{from, self()},
 4287: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4288: 
 4289:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4290:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4291: 
 4292:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4293:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4294: 
 4295: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4296:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4297:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4298:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4299:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4300: 					{host, Hostname},
 4301: 					{from, self()},
 4302:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4303: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4304: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4305:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4306:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4307: 
 4308: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4309:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4310:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4311:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4312: 					{from, self()},
 4313: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4314: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4315: 
 4316:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4317:     Error = Server.
 4318: 
 4319: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4320:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4321:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4322:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4323:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4324:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4325:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4326:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4327:     CaCerts =
 4328: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4329: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4330: 			  CaCert
 4331: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4332:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4333: 
 4334: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4335:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4336:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4337:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4338:                                    true;
 4339:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4340:                                    false
 4341:                            end, Stats),
 4342:     case List of
 4343:         [] ->
 4344:             nok;
 4345:         _  ->
 4346:             ok
 4347:     end.
 4348: 
 4349: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4350:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4351: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4352:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4353: 
 4354: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4355:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4356:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4357:             ok;
 4358:         Other ->
 4359:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4360:     end.
 4361: 
 4362: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4363:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4364: log(_,_) ->
 4365:     ok.
 4366: 
 4367: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'tlsv1.3';
 4368:                                Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4369:                                Version == 'tlsv1.1';
 4370:                                Version == 'tlsv1' ->
 4371:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4372:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4373: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'dtlsv1.2';
 4374:                                Version == 'dtlsv1' ->
 4375:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4376:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4377: 
 4378: length_all(Version) ->
 4379:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4380: 
 4381: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4382:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4383: 
 4384:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4385:                   end,
 4386:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4387: 
 4388: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.3') -> ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4389: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.2') -> ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4390: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.1') -> ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4391: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1') -> ['tlsv1'].
 4392: 
 4393: 
 4394: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4395:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4396:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4397:                   end,
 4398:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4399: 
 4400: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1.2') -> ['dtlsv1.2', 'dtlsv1'];
 4401: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1') -> ['dtlsv1'].
 4402: 
 4403: 
 4404: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4405:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4406:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4407: 
 4408: 
 4409: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4410:     lists:flatmap(fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4411:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4412: 
 4413: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4414:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4415:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4416:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4417:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4418:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4419:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4420: 
 4421: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4422:     Version = ssl:tls_version(dtls_record:protocol_version_name(DTLSVersion)),
 4423:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4424:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4425:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4426:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4427:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4428: 
 4429: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4430:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4431:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4432: 
 4433:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4434: 					{from, self()},
 4435:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4436:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4437:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4438: 
 4439:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4440:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4441:                                          {from, self()},
 4442:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4443:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4444: 					]),
 4445: 
 4446:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4447:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4448:     ssl:stop(),
 4449:     ssl:start().
 4450: 
 4451: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4452:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4453:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4454:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4455:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4456: 
 4457:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4458:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4459: 
 4460:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4461:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4462: 
 4463:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4464:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4465: 
 4466:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4467:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4468: 
 4469:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4470:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4471:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4472:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4473:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4474:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4475:        },
 4476:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4477:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4478:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4479:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4480:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4481:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4482:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4483:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4484:     ];

 4557:        },

 4559:     ];
 4560: test_config(_, Config) ->
 4561:     RSAConf1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config),
 4562:     SRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4563:     CRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4564: 
 4565:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4566:     SRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4567:     CRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4568: 
 4569:     {SRSA1Cert, SRSA1Key, _SRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA1Opts),
 4570:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4571: 
 4572:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4573:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4574: 
 4575:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSA2Cert, keyfile => SRSA2Key},
 4576:                                         #{certfile => SRSA1Cert, keyfile => SRSA1Key}]},
 4577:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4578:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4579:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4580:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4581:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4582:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4583:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4584: 
 4585: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4586:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4587:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4588:             ok;
 4589:         {ok, Other} ->
 4590:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4591:     end.
 4592: 
 4593: 
 4594: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4595:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4596:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4597:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4598:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4599:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4600:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4601: 
 4602: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4603:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4604:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4605:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4606:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4607:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4608:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4609: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4610:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4611:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4612:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4613:                                                  },
 4614:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4615:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4616:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4617: 
 4618: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4619:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4620:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4621:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4622:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4623: 
 4624: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4625:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4626:     Der.
 4627: 
 4628: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4629:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4630:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4631: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4632:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4633:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4634:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4635: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4636:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4637: 
 4638: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4639:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4640:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4641:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4642:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4643:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4644:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4645:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4646:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4647:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4648:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4649:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4650:                %% EDDSA
 4651:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4652:                eddsa_ed448
 4653:               ],
 4654:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4655:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts],
 4656:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config, handshake_failure),
 4657:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4658:                                     [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4659: 
 4660: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4661:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4662:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4663:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4664:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4665:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4666:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4667:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4668:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4669:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4670:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4671:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4672:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4673:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4674: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4675:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4676:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4677:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4678: 
 4679: 
 4680: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default('tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4681:     [_ | Suites] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4682:     Suites;
 4683: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version) ->
 4684:     ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(ecdhe_rsa, aes_128_gcm, Version).
 4685: 
 4686: suite_check(Socket, 'tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4687:     [_, Suite| _] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4688:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4689:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4690:             ok;
 4691:         Other ->
 4692:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4693:     end;
 4694: suite_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4695:     [Suite |_] = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version),
 4696:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4697:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4698:             ok;
 4699:         Other ->
 4700:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4701:     end.
